Basic_cake.cooking_method: Default method: just mix all ingredients.['cream', 'dough']
Basic_cake.name: Basic cake

Esterhazy.cooking_method: buttercream spice with cognac and vanilla,  sandwich it between 4 or 5 layers of almond meringue dough
Esterhazy.name: Esterhazy

Croquembouche.cooking_method: Stir sugar and water (3 to 1) and make toffee. Place profiteroles in  pyramid manner, use toffee and hot water to fix them. Pour pyramid with remain toffee and beautify.
Croquembouche.name: Croquembouche
